6. The third moment is the ENGAGEMENT WITH meaning [In-sein: being “in” meaning]. Chapter 5 will clarify the essence of this “engagement with.”
But in each of these three moments we must see the whole of our engagement with meaning. This engagement is an a priori structure of ex-sistence, but of itself it does not suffice for a full definition of exsistence.
We begin by looking at the third factor, our engagement with meaningfulness.
